programme.title: Japanese Americans 1942
programme.short_synopsis: The order by FDR to remove of all Japanese living in California in 1942.
programme.medium_synopsis: Executive Order 9066, Franklin D Roosevelt's presidential order that authorised the removal of all Japanese living in California in February 1942, remembered.
